descriptionHtml:
##########BETA##############################################
This MOD is to enchance Arrow with spell and elemental proprieties, like in the Thief series. If you like that game, this MOD is for you!

Where to find the Arrows ? 
They are at Dragon Brige in the Four Shield Tavern, in a chest (look at the pictures link with this mod)

Be sure to try the arrow on a living target to see the effect they have you can use this console command to spawn some ennemy :
Player.Placeatme 46794 5 (The number \"5\" at the end is the number of soldier (46794) that will spawn

@CHANGE@Vers 1.4
AWESOME NEWS AND LOTS OF FUN!! 

NEW ARROW : Thief\'s Icy Ground Arrow : Make ennemy slept on the iced ground (fun as hell)
Cherry Blossom Arrow Effect as been updated : Stronger Froce effect on target (a lot and alot of fun)
All the Wind Arrow Effect as been updated : Now wind arrow blow away ennemy

@CHANGE@Vers 1.3

Arrow Finaly does EFFECT, Ice can freeze, fire burn, Poison poison ect.. !! Yes !! :). I tryed to balance a bit the arrow. Changed the name of the Arrow to their real name. We are getting there !

@CHANGE@Vers 1.2

Tuned the effect of some arrows, added several light effect, added some sound to arrow that did not have any, added more fire to the Awesome Oil Arrow.

######### SPECIAL THANKS TO BEST IN SLOT ####################

Thanks to Best In Slot for this amazing review. He is a really professional reviewer be sure to check his page and suscribe to his channel :

MOD Tutorial : http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLE3E7CC13B95E5AB6&feature=plcp
Skyrim Mod Spotlight : http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL540DC4A527B1D5DE&feature=plcp

############## ARROW DESCRIPTION #######################################

I won\'t go deep in that because many are just obvious :

Energy Typhoon : Drain Magika
Cherry Blossom : Sniper/Ninja kind of arrow with Draining life/Hudge Impact force
Earth : Stagger the ennemy (One of my favorite!!)
Firerain : Shoot in on an objet that is 6 feet higher than the target, and it should do a fire rain
Ghost : Shoot it on a Corpse to Reanimate Dead
Stronger Ice : Will Deep Freeze ennemy (Like the Ice Form Shout, realy cool arrow)
Paralyzing : Apply the Paralyzing effect for 6 sec
Oil : Will leave a burning spot that damage ennemies (One of my favorite too!)
Poison : Explode in a poison gaz
Void : Suck up on life of ennemy ( I want to make this one like a black hole and make target disapear)
Web : Paralyze ennemy for 4 sec

Poopy and Scubag arrow are just a Easter Egg : Poopy make fall Dinosaure poop from the sky and Scumbag insult you.


############## HELP NEEDED ##############################################

I need Help From Other MODER!
Things that I need Help With :
-Tunning down some Effect
-Apply \"real\" magic effect to my arrows : arrows that freeze and slow, that burn the target
-Apply some area of effect effect : Same thing there, fire on the ground that burn overtime, and ect..
-Kill Cam, I want to do a Sniper Arrow that trigger a cam that follow the arrow
-General Tuning
-Create recipe to make those arrows

Thanks

PS. I want to do a Vampire Mod that would be like Kain the game \"Legacy of Kain : Blood Omen\", I would need help from devlopper too on that, if interested PM me !!
author: Sayajiin
